entry.description: My road trip with Grandpa and Yvonne.

event.note: Left to go to peach festival.
Went 2 miles east on Highway 20 to Marysville.
Went on 20 to 99 then forked onto 113.
We traveled the entire length of 113 for the first time.
Went down 12 to Rio Vista and ate at the head restaurant.
Went on the road arcoss the river from 160 back home.
